name: DJLOOP File
summary: A DJL file is a DJLOOP file created by the Ketron DJL Compiler. It contains an audio loop compiled from eight different .WAV files. DJL files are meant to be transferred to and played on a Ketron Midijay Live Audio Player.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Transfer to a Ketron Midijay Live Audio Player

macos.display_name: Transfer to a Ketron Midijay Live Audio Player

linux.display_name: Transfer to a Ketron Midijay Live Audio Player
